entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023
